meanings.definition: A concluding section in a book, typically written by the author.
meanings.sent1: The afterword provided additional insights into the author's writing process.
meanings.sent2: I always enjoy reading the afterword to learn more about the author's inspiration.
meanings.sent3: The afterword was like a bonus chapter at the end of the book.
meanings.sent4: Her afterword was a heartfelt conclusion to the novel, leaving readers with a sense of closure.
meanings.sent5: The afterword acted as a literary dessert, offering a sweet ending to the story.

meanings.definition: A brief statement or comment following the main body of a text.
meanings.sent1: The afterword at the end of the article summarized the key points discussed.
meanings.sent2: Don't forget to read the afterword for some interesting author reflections.
meanings.sent3: The afterword was like a friendly wave goodbye from the writer.
meanings.sent4: His afterword was a cherry on top of the sundae of his writing, adding a final touch.
meanings.sent5: The afterword served as a helpful guide to understanding the main text better.
